RelatedSentence: The Finance Ministry has demanded the Election Commission of Pakistan ( ECP )  to refund Rs 3 billion it provided to hold the local government elections .
According to a private TV channel , the Ministry had released Rs 3 billion to the ECP last year for local body polls .
The ECP has so far not paid the Pakistan Army and National Database and Registration Authority ( NADRA ) for their services during general elections 2013 .
